input: edge technologies to find talent in the technology sector is critical. The days of advertising and posting are not even remotely as effective as they were say five, seven years ago. Typically you've got to go out and utilize technology to find talent.
offline_reference: 利用前沿技术发掘科技领域的人才至关重要，如今通过广告和发布招聘信息的方式已远不如五到七年前有效，通常必须主动运用技术手段来寻找人才。
